data.name: Bonfire Peaks - Lost Memories
data.detailed_description: Starting later this year you'll be able to explore new areas with new puzzles in Bonfire Peaks: Lost Memories, three chapters of DLC for this critically beloved puzzle game, each with new mechanics and new puzzles.
data.about_the_game: Starting later this year you'll be able to explore new areas with new puzzles in Bonfire Peaks: Lost Memories, three chapters of DLC for this critically beloved puzzle game, each with new mechanics and new puzzles.
data.short_description: Three chapters of DLC for this critically beloved puzzle game, each with new mechanics and new puzzles.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
